entry.title: Encore

Author: ireaLEEknow

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,106Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: You thought the front row was as close as you’d ever get.Until Chan locks eyes with you during the show. Until you feel it in your gut—he’s not just performing for the crowd anymore. He’s performing for you.And after the encore, he takes you backstage.Where the real show begins.Where you learn what it means to be owned.
